entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.9°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
